Text: Is this a junk upload, or is something odd with the formatting? Nothing plays beyond the first few seconds, trying to feed the files through a converter spits out 2-20 second clips, can't seem to make these files do anything on any PC with any player or editing software.
I've played each one of the files using VLC media player and had no problems whatsoever. Trust me, I wouldn't waste my time seeding an 18 gig file if it wasn't worth anything.
